notes.zh: 请将 api_key 替换为从平台获取的真实密钥，ip_ranges 改为你矿场的实际IP范围；命令执行只接受 miner_id 定位，本地白名单解析IP，忽略云端 ip_address；Collector 会在 cache_dir/device_id 生成 device_id 并随结果回传
notes.en: Replace api_key with your real key from the platform, and ip_ranges with your farm's actual IP range; Commands use miner_id only (local whitelist resolves IP), cloud ip_address is ignored; Collector generates device_id under cache_dir/device_id and reports it with results
